author: dasssss

comments.content:
Can you provide the URL from which you capped this?

EDIT: Never mind. Knowing that your sample is part of an invitation for the LAND Studio event at Billy Reid in Austin didn’t get me a bigger sample or any more useful info.

Perhaps someone else will recognize it.

Can't identify it either but as this invitation comes from [L A N D](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071232/http:/www.workbyland.com/) (and Caleb Owen Everitt), I'd be not surprised if it finally remains unidentified. Most of their works are hand-drawn or (heavily) customization of existing typefaces ('Easy Tiger', 'Stag', 'Forestbound', 'Patagonia', 'Hufnagel'... see [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071232/http:/www.google.fr/search?hl=en&source=hp&q=site:typophile.com/node+everitt) for previous discussions).

You're right, it could be a completely hand drawn piece.

LAND does some excellent lettering

Thanks guys!
